# **[libvert](https://libvirt.org/)**

**[Back to Research List](../../research_list.md)**\
**[Back to Multipass Menu](./multipass_menu.md)**\
**[Back to Current Status](../../../development/status/weekly/current_status.md)**\
**[Back to Main](../../../README.md)**

libvirt is an open-source API, daemon and management tool for managing platform virtualization. It can be used to manage KVM, Xen, VMware ESXi, QEMU and other virtualization technologies. These APIs are widely used in the orchestration layer of hypervisors in the development of a cloud-based solution. Wikipedia
Default location: /var/lib/libvirt/images github.com
Initial release: December 19, 2005; 18 years ago
License: GNU Lesser General Public License
Stable release: 10.0.0 / 15 January 2024; 4 months ago
